title: Real World Weapon Sound Effects
description: Real World Weapons Sound Effects pack, the ultimate collection of high-quality weapon  sound effects for games and movies. This pack contains over 570 authentic sound effects of some of the most popular and iconic firearms from around the world.
longDescription:
The Real World Weapons Sound Effects pack is a comprehensive collection of authentic, high-quality weapon sound effects that can be used in games, movies, and other audio productions. These sound effects can be used anywhere that authentic, high-quality weapon sound effects are needed. This pack includes a wide selection of different kinds of firearms, such as assault rifles, pistols, shotguns, sniper rifles, and more, making it suitable for use in a wide range of projects thanks to its versatility. It doesn't matter if you're making a gangster movie, a military shooter game, or any other kind of audio production; these sound effects will add a level of realism and immersion that you simply can't get with generic sound effects.


Every sound that is included in this pack has been painstakingly recorded, retouched, and mastered to ensure that it is of the highest possible quality and clarity. The sounds were captured using cutting-edge technology in a variety of settings, including indoor and outdoor locations, to ensure that no detail was missed in the recording process. The environments included both indoor and outdoor locations. This indicates that the sounds included in this pack will sound as realistic and natural as is humanly possible. Because of this, the sounds in this pack are ideal for use in any audio production.


It doesn't matter if you're a game designer, a film producer, or an audio engineer; our Real World Weapons Sound Effects pack is an indispensable instrument for developing immersive and compelling aural experiences. You will have access to a wide variety of high-quality weapon sounds, all of which are included in this pack, which will assist you in bringing your projects to life. Add this pack to your existing collection of sounds as soon as possible to catapult the quality of your audio productions to the next level.


DEMO Sounds
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Assault Rifle
  • Gun Foley
  • Machinegun
  • Pistol
  • Shotgun
  • Sniper Rfle


Number of Audio Waves: 580

Number of Audio Cues: 580

Sample rate / bit rate: WAV 96K 24bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 24 min

Supported Development Platforms:

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: Single user license, royalty-free
